uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique universal identity code for this tax identity.

country.title: Country Code
country.description: ISO country code for Where the tax identity was issued.

zone.title: Zone Code
zone.description:
Where inside the country the tax identity holder is based for tax purposes
like a village, town, district, city, county, state or province. For some
areas, this could be a regular post or zip code. See the regime packages
for specific validation rules.

type.title: Type
type.description:
Type is set according the requirements of each regime, some have a single
tax document type code, others require a choice to be made.

code.title: Code
code.description: Normalized code shown on the original identity document.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional details that may be required.

Identity.description: Identity stores the details required to identify an entity for tax purposes.
